trans-unit.source: Full Stack Developer with a background in electrical engineering and a passion for building high-performance web and mobile applications. I am the sole developer of the app snaptab and the maintainer of the Flutter open-source libraries pro_image_editor and pro_video_editor.
Alternatively, you can get in touch via the contact form.
All the projects listed below were both designed and coded exclusively by me.
Take a look at the portfolio to know more about Alex Frei
Attempt to keep your mind under control without getting confused.
Congratulations, you scored points and mistakes!
You made a lot of mistakes. Take it slow next time, I'm sure you can get better!
Not bad, you just made a few mistakes. But can you also do it without any mistakes?
Great job, you didn't make any mistakes. But can you score more points in that time without making any mistakes?
&nbspThe goal is to score more than 60 points without any mistakes!
&nbspBut wait a minute, you got more than 60 points?!! That's awesome, seems like you're a genius!
Your current high score is points with mistakes!

This mini-game tests your brain to see how well you can concentrate on something without being distracted. The game always shows you an item with the title “Color” or “Meaning” and a colored text. Below that, you will always see six randomly generated buttons. Your goal is to press the correct button that matches the title and text. You have one minute to score as many points as possible with as few mistakes as possible. For example, the title is “Color” and the text is “nine” with the color “red”. In this case, you should press the button below, which has a red color. In case the title is “Meaning”, you should press the button with the number “nine”.

You can choose your own topic. For example, you can enter "Soccer" or "Angular," from which a unique quiz will be generated for you. Alternatively, you can also press "Random" below to select a random topic.
Insert a topic like Angular or Soccer
The topic must be between 3 and 20 characters long!
The topic must be a text and not a number
Great job! Your answer is correct!
I'm sorry, but the correct answer was .
One moment please The quiz will be generated. This usually takes less than 5 seconds.

I see that you are trying to hack the game! Even if you haven’t succeeded yet, taking that first step is the beginning of becoming a hacker. Let me give you a tip for success. "Open the browser console and play around"

This game is like the quiz show "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire." You will try to win the million, but you choose the topic. If you're unfamiliar, the rules of this quiz game are quite simple. You attempt to answer as many questions as possible until the one-million question, which progressively get more difficult. You always choose between four answers, where only one answer is correct.
It seems like you still have more to learn about this topic before you can master it. Try a new topic, and let's see if you can win more than CHF there.

It seems that you are a genius in this topic, congratulations! However, I have some disappointing news: I'm not rich, so you haven't won a million. The only reward you'll receive is the experience and enjoyment you've had ;)
Can you emerge victorious on the millionaire show with your AI-generated topic?
Do you feel tired about checking out a lot of CVs?
Let's play a mini-game which I created to relax a bit!
Let's play a mini-game to relax a bit!
Take a look on the resume from Alex Frei.
Download the CV as a PDF
First Name, Last Name, and Message as well as E-Mail are required.
Too many attempts to send the form. Try again later.
The request has been successfully submitted.
Invalid data sent. Please fill out the form correctly and try again.
Your IP address has been blacklisted because you have sent an unusually high number of requests to the server! If these requests were not made maliciously, please contact me via
What could be more relaxing than a refreshing swim? And swimming counts as exercise, so it's the perfect win-win for body and mind.
As electronics enthusiast i spend my free time drawing schematics, writing code and turning my apartment into a high-tech lab.
I am one of those people who love the silence of the wilderness, following the call of the birds and experiencing nature as a unique symphony.
A powerful, customizable Flutter image editor with multi-threading, localization, and a rich set of editing tools.

The ProImageEditor is a versatile Flutter widget that enables seamless image editing within applications. It offers a comprehensive suite of tools, including painting, text insertion, cropping, filtering, and more.
The editor supports multi-threading through Dart isolates and web workers, ensuring efficient performance across platforms.
With customizable UI elements, localization support, and various design themes, ProImageEditor provides developers with a flexible and user-friendly solution for integrating image editing capabilities into their Flutter projects.
A native-code Flutter video editor with trimming, cropping, and effects across platforms.

ProVideoEditor is a native-code Flutter plugin for advanced video editing across all major platforms. It offers features like trimming, cropping, scaling, rotation, flipping, and adding visual effects or overlays, all implemented using platform-native APIs for maximum performance and compatibility.
Unlike FFmpeg-based solutions, this editor is optimized for real-time responsiveness and supports concurrent processing, making it ideal for demanding video editing tasks in mobile and desktop applications.
A smart web and mobile app for craftsmen with time tracking, scheduling, invoicing, and Stripe payments.

The application snaptab was primarily developed for craftsmen and offers a wide range of features. From time tracking to scheduling appointments, tasks, project workflows, and even creating invoices and quotes, everything is provided. All of this is enhanced with artificial intelligence and the ability to collect payments directly from customers using Stripe. Through the customer portal, customers can directly access data shared by the company.

The application is offered as a web app as well as a mobile app for Android and iOS.
My company site featuring two hidden games, an image conversion tool, and a fast, accessible, fully responsive design.

This website introduces WAIO Applications, my own company. Alongside information about my company, it offers two captivating games to enrich the user experience.
You can find one of these games by clicking on the "Team" tab and then pressing the "Icebreaker" button. The other game is hidden as an "easter egg" on the homepage. Simply scroll to the "For all devices" section, click on the red rectangle (which represents a phone with a scale animation).

On the subdomain image.waio.ch, we provide a straightforward tool for resizing and converting images to various formats and sizes.

The website was designed with a focus on performance and accessibility, and it is fully responsive, ensuring a seamless experience across all devices.

Most of the UI/UX part of this project is not mine.
A package for smooth, animated number transitions, ideal for counters and real-time data updates.

A package that elegantly animates number changes, creating a visually engaging transition from one value to another, perfect for counting or displaying real-time data updates.

Please note that the preview below may not appear as smooth as it does in reality. This is because I reduced the frame rate of the GIF to conserve storage space.
A package for smooth hero animations, letting users tap images to zoom into an immersive full-screen view.

A package to implement hero animations, allowing users to click on images and smoothly zoom them into a larger, immersive view, enhancing the user experience and interaction with images.

Please note that the preview below may not appear as smooth as it does in reality. This is because I reduced the frame rate of the GIF to conserve storage space.
A CSS scroll animation package with customizable or pre-built effects that trigger on viewport entry, once or multiple times.

A package for implementing CSS scroll animations on elements. These animations activate when an element enters the viewport during page scrolling. Users have the flexibility to configure the animations to trigger multiple times or just once. Additionally, the package offers pre-made animations as well as the option to create custom ones to suit various requirements.
A real-time control app for managing GPIO ports and monitoring personal beehives, with no coding required.

This project is a real-time control application designed to simplify hardware interaction. It allows users to configure and control GPIO ports through an intuitive interface—no programming skills needed.
Beyond GPIO control, the app also connects to a personal beehive system, providing live data such as internal temperature and honey production levels. This combination of real-time control and smart monitoring makes it a powerful tool for hobbyists and makers alike.
A modern, responsive website for a sushi and bubble tea bar, focused on fresh ingredients and modern design.

Umami House is a stylish and fully responsive website developed for a sushi and bubble tea bar located in the heart of Zurich. The site was designed to reflect the brand’s focus on high-quality ingredients, modern presentation, and a welcoming atmosphere. Visitors can explore the full menu, learn about the restaurant’s concept, and easily find essential information like location and opening hours.

The website is built with performance and user experience in mind, ensuring fast load times and seamless navigation across all devices. Special attention was given to responsive design, accessibility, and clean visual aesthetics. The project highlights how a well-crafted digital presence can elevate a local business and connect with a broader audience.

Snaptab is a smart all-in-one app designed to optimize business administration. From project management and time tracking to invoicing, snaptab automates administrative processes and saves valuable time.
A modern, responsive website for a sushi and bubble tea bar, focused on fresh ingredients and modern design

A cross-platform video editor built with Flutter and native code integration, offering powerful features such as trimming, cropping, and visual effects. Designed for high performance and native-like user experience on Android, iOS, macOS, Windows, and the Web.
A high-performance open-source image editor for Flutter, featuring multi-threading, CPU control, cropping, rotation, filters, text layers, pixelation, and non-destructive editing.
A set of lightweight libraries for smooth scroll animations, immersive image transitions, and dynamic number effects—enhancing user experience with minimal effort.

A digital prototype of the educational concept that is accessible online. Parents can inform themselves at any time about the educational principles and goals, which promotes greater transparency and trust. At the same time, teachers have the opportunity to edit the concept directly online, adapt content, and collaboratively develop it further.
Developed various projects, including the company website and a management tool. Created a web app for “Schule Rotflue” to simplify the presentation of their pedagogical concept.
I developed a report app with Ionic for craftsmen to simplify report creation and management. Lessons from this project laid the foundation for snaptab’s enhanced features and functionality.
Completed a three-month training in Eschlikon at Bingesser Huber Elektro AG, gaining hands-on experience in fiber optic splicing, as well as outdoor and indoor installations.
My first major project, a simple report app built with Java and libGDX, developed for use at my workplace. It provided valuable experience in mobile development and future projects.
Learned programming with Java and developed an Endless Runner game using libGDX, gaining hands-on experience in game development and software design.
Development screenshots of the “Endless Runner” game that I programmed with libGDX.
Worked as an electrical installer, service technician, and project manager at Elektro Sutter. In 2018, transitioned to an 80% workload to dedicate more time to programming.
Completed basic training followed by advanced training to achieve the rank of Wachtmeister.
Worked as an electrical installer, gaining hands-on experience in installations and electrical systems.
Completed a vocational apprenticeship, earning the EFZ certification as an electrical installer, with practical experience in electrical systems and installations.
Certificate of apprenticeship for Certified Electrical-Installer EFZ.
Just a baby, no coding skills yet!
Crafting fast, responsive, and user-friendly websites with modern frameworks like Angular. Whether it's a portfolio, a business site, or a full-fledged web app, I build solutions that stand out.
Developing high-performance mobile applications with Flutter or Ionic. I focus on smooth user experiences and cross-platform compatibility to ensure apps work seamlessly on both iOS and Android.
Blending aesthetics with functionality. I create clean UI/UX designs that enhance usability and engage users, ensuring an intuitive and visually appealing digital experience.
Building scalable and efficient backends with Node.js, Firebase, and Supabase. From APIs to databases, I make sure everything runs securely and smoothly behind the scenes.
